import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import ComparisonStatus from './ComparisonStatus' import { updateTradeStatus } from '../../services/supabase' const TradeRow = ({ trade }) => { const [isExpanded, setIsExpanded] = useState(false) // Allow expansion for both MATCHED and UNMATCHED trades const canExpand = trade.comparison_status === "MATCHED" || trade.comparison_status === "UNMATCHED" const handleExpand = (e) => { e.preventDefault() e.stopPropagation() setIsExpanded(!isExpanded) } // Add back the missing functions const handleResolve = async () => { try { await updateTradeStatus(trade.id, 'Resolved') } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to update trade status:', error) } } const getCellClassName = (field) => { if (!trade.comparison) return '' return trade.comparison[field] ? 'discrepancy' : '' } // Function to render the comparison content based on status const renderComparisonContent = () => { if (trade.comparison_status === "UNMATCHED") { return (
Unmatched Trade

No matching trade found in external system for:

  • Security Symbol: {trade.securitysymbol}
  • Trade Date: {new Date(trade.tradedate).toLocaleDateString()}
  • Counterparty: {trade.counterparty}
  • DTC Number: {trade.dtc_number}
{trade.exception_reason && (

Exception Details

{trade.exception_reason}

)}
) } // Existing MATCHED comparison view return ( <>

Trade Date: {new Date(trade.tradedate).toLocaleDateString()}
Security: {trade.securitysymbol}
Price: {trade.price.toFixed(2)}
Quantity: {trade.quantity}
Settlement: {new Date(trade.settlementdate).toLocaleDateString()}

Trade Date: {new Date(trade.tradedate).toLocaleDateString()}
Security: {trade.securitysymbol}
Price: {trade.price.toFixed(2)}
Quantity: {trade.quantity}
Settlement: {new Date(trade.settlementdate).toLocaleDateString()}
Counterparty: {trade.counterparty}
DTC Number: {trade.dtc_number}
) } return ( <> {new Date(trade.tradedate).toLocaleDateString()} {trade.age} {trade.securitysymbol} {trade.price.toFixed(2)} {trade.quantity} {new Date(trade.settlementdate).toLocaleDateString()} {trade.counterparty} {trade.dtc_number} {trade.settlement_status} {!trade.isresolved && trade.comparison_status !== 'Matched' && ( )} {isExpanded && (
{renderComparisonContent()}
